pages.text: The Alloy Kiln is a simple furnace made out of heat resistant sandstone and bricks. Within it, temperatures are high enough to allow metals to be melted into a fluid state and mixed, creating an $(l:patchouli:overview/alloys)Alloy$(/l).

pages.name: Alloy Kiln
pages.text: The structure is built from the following $(t:8 Alloy Kiln Bricks)$(#007500)blocks$().
To form the multiblock, right-click the top block of one side with an Engineer's hammer.
